compliant.section:
本隱私權政策之變更
本公司得隨時變更本政策。若本公司對本政策進行任何變更，變更將會張貼於本網頁且以下「最近更新日期」將會有所更動。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to information; Transparency and modalities; Clear and plain language
Right to information; Contact details of the controller

compliant.section:

02-305 Warsaw

(HTC Poland sp. z o.o. 是宏達國際電子股份有限公司在歐盟之代表機構。)
compliant.legal provisions: Representatives of controllers or processors not established in the Union

non_compliant.section: 本隱私權政策的最近更新日期為 2023 年 10 月 3 日。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are not collected from the data subject; Date of the data
non_compliant.amend: The policy should state when the data was last accessed or modified, not just when the policy was updated.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to information; Contact details of the controller
non_compliant.amend: The policy should include the full legal name and contact details of the controller, not just the copyright notice.
